name: Brain *uck.
description:
Brain F!$# is an esoteric programming language. Inspired by that language I created this game.

Also, this game really helps you in improving in decision-making ability of your brain.

I cant win this game. If you can,  then take screenshot and tag me at

https://www.instagram.com/buggamestudio/

or 

https://twitter.com/BugGames1

 1. Use AWSD keys to move camera [while not typing]
 2. You can see total number of bullet on bottom
 3. You can see number times you can run your code in button
 4.  You have to destroy both red tanks
 5. If you run of bullet or number of chances to run code you will lose.
 6. '>' to move forward
 7. '<' to move backward
 8. '+' to rotate 1 degree clock wise
 9. '-' to rotate 1 degree anti clock wise
10. ',' to rotate 90 degree clock wise
11. '.' to rotate 90 degree anti clock wise
12. ']' to shoot a bullet
13. '[' to wait for 2 sec
These are commands for running code
Sample code "+..>>][>>>,++++++>]"

[This is not a professional game this is only for portfolio]
